org.apache.spark.rpc.netty

类 SharedMessageLoop

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.rpc.netty.MessageLoop
      • org.apache.spark.rpc.netty.SharedMessageLoop
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Logging

    public class SharedMessageLoop
extends MessageLoop
    A message loop that serves multiple RPC endpoints, using a shared thread pool.
